mapper.select: select qno as no, /*QnA 순번*/ q_title as title, /*QnA 제목*/ q_create, /*QnA 작성일*/ u.mid as id /*작성자*/ from question q left join user u on q.qid = u.mno order by no desc
select ifnull(count(*), 0) as cnt from question where 1 = 1

select qno as no, /*QnA 순번*/ q_title as title, /*QnA 제목*/ q_create, /*QnA 작성일*/ u.mid as id /*작성자*/ from question q left join user u on q.qid = u.mno where 1 = 1 order by no desc LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into question ( q_title, /*QnA 제목*/ q_content, /*QnA 내용*/ q_create, /*QnA 작성일*/ qid /*작성자*/ ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{qid} )
mapper.select: select q.qno as no, /*QnA 순번*/ q.q_title as title, /*QnA 제목*/ q.q_content as content, /*QnA 내용*/ q.q_create , /*QnA 작성일*/ q.q_update, /*QnA 수정일*/ u.mid as id /*작성자*/ from question q inner join user u on q.qid = u.mno where q.qno = #{no}
mapper.update: update question set q_title = #{title}, /*QnA 제목*/ q_content = #{content}, /*QnA 내용*/ q_update = now() /*QnA 수정일*/ where qno = #{no}
mapper.select: select qno as no, /*질문 순번*/ aid, /*답변자 회원번호*/ ano, /*답변 순번*/ a_content as comment, /*답변*/ a_create /*답변 작성일*/ from answer a where 1=1 and qno = #{qno} order by qno asc
mapper.insert: insert into answer ( qno, aid, a_content, a_create ) values ( #{no}, #{aid}, #{comment}, now() )
